name: Blight (itch) (Audaxxy)
description:
Blight is a semi-cooperative arena brawler where you must fight with your friends through a long forgotten tomb of the demon lord Balor. Slay hordes of demons utilizing the accursed Skullblade in order claim the Hellcrown, using its power to kill your friends! There's only enough room for one boss in this dungeon!

Note: To host networking, you must currently have port "28015" open on your network!
